section.name: Summary
section.p: dishevelled.org codegen is a java source code generation suite based on Velocity [1] templates that generates source code in several different styles. The codegen project requires java version 1.5 or later.

section.name: Example
section.p:
For further details on source code styles, please see the javadoc for
> Style
or the Velocity templates themselves
> src/main/resources/org/dishevelled/codegen
